65 Radar_EthDataPacketPrms pDataPacket[TDA_NUM_CONNECTED_DEVICES_MAX + 1];
66 DevComm_NetworkCtrlReqPrms pDevCtrlPrms[TDA_NUM_CONNECTED_DEVICES_MAX + 1];
67 
68 TDADevCtx_t gTDA_devCtx[TDA_NUM_CONNECTED_DEVICES_MAX] = { 0 };
69 volatile UINT32 gSpiRxSignal[TDA_NUM_CONNECTED_DEVICES_MAX] = { 0 };
70 UINT32 gSpiRxLength[TDA_NUM_CONNECTED_DEVICES_MAX] = { 0 };
71 UINT8 gSpiRxData[TDA_NUM_CONNECTED_DEVICES_MAX][512];
72 TDA_EVENT_HANDLER gTDACARD_Callback;
73 HANDLE gThreadHdl;
74 captureConfig_t gCaptureConfigParams;
75 NetworkRadarDeviceMap_param gDeviceMapParams;
76 NetworkTDA_Obj gNetworkTDA_obj;
77 Network_SockObj gNetwork_SockObj;
78 CRITICAL_SECTION gNetwork_Write_cs;

80 UINT32 TDA_HostIntrThreadLoop[TDA_NUM_CONNECTED_DEVICES_MAX];
81 UINT32 TDA_HostIntrExitThread = 0;
82 UINT32 TDA_NumOfRunningSPIThreads = 0;
83 UINT32 TDA_NetworkThreadRunning = 0;
84 UINT32 TDA_StartTraceACK = 0;
85 UINT32 TDA_GetVersionACK = 0;
86 UINT32 magicWord = 0;

96 extern void DEBUG_PRINT(char *fmt, ...);
97 extern void CloseTraceFile();
98 
99 DWORD WINAPI Network_waitConnect(LPVOID lpParam)
100 {
101  UINT32 *pMem;
102  UINT32 prmSize = 0;
103  pMem = malloc(512);
104 
105  if (pMem == NULL)
106  {
107  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Unable to allocate memory for response parameters\n");
108  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
109  }
110 
111  /* Initialize the Rx thread */
112  TDA_NetworkThreadRunning = 1;
113 
114  while (TDA_NetworkThreadRunning)
115  {
116  /* Check if any information is available on the socket */
117  INT32 status = Network_waitRead(&gNetwork_SockObj);
118 
119  /* If information is available */
120  if (status == 1)
121  {
122  /* Read header response */
123  INT32 response = RecvResponse(&prmSize);
124  if (response != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
125  {
126  /* Notify mmWaveStudio about network error */
127  gTDACARD_Callback(1, CAPTURE_RESPONSE_NETWORK_ERROR, \
128  0, response, NULL);
129  break;
130  }
131 
132  /* If there are bytes to read */
133  if (prmSize)
134  {
135  /* Read data */
136  RecvResponseParams((UINT8*)pMem, prmSize);
137  /* Process the data */
138  Radar_processData((Radar_EthDataPacketPrms *)pMem, prmSize);
139  }
140  }
141  }
142  DEBUG_PRINT("# INFO: Rx thread about to die\r\n");
143  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
144 }
145 
159 STATUS Radar_formEthDataPacket(Radar_EthDataPacketPrms *pDataPacket,
160  DevComm_NetworkCtrlReqPrms *pDevCtrlPrms, UINT16 responseCode,
161  UINT16 dataLength, UINT8* data)
162 {
163  INT32 status = SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK;
164  Radar_EthDataPacketPrms dataPacket = { 0 };
165  UINT16 crc = 0;
166  UINT8* pDataBuf = (UINT8*)pDevCtrlPrms->respParam;
167 
168  dataPacket.syncByte = TX_SYNC_BYTE;
169  dataPacket.opcode = responseCode;
170  dataPacket.ackCode = 0;
171  dataPacket.dataLength = dataLength;
172  dataPacket.devSelection = pDataPacket->devSelection;
173  dataPacket.ackType = pDataPacket->ackType;
174 
175  if (data != NULL)
176  {
177  memcpy(dataPacket.data, data, dataLength - DATA_HEADER_LENGTH);
178  }
179 
180  status = Bsp_ar12xxComputeCrc((UINT8 *)((UINT8 *)&dataPacket + 2), dataLength, \
181  RL_CRC_TYPE_16BIT_CCITT, (UINT8 *)&crc);
182  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
183  {
184  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: CRC calculation failed\n");
185  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
186  }
187 
188  *(UINT16*)(dataPacket.data + dataLength - DATA_HEADER_LENGTH) = crc;
189  memcpy(pDevCtrlPrms->respParam, &dataPacket, (dataLength + HEADER_AND_CRC_LENGTH));
190  pDevCtrlPrms->respParamSize = dataLength + HEADER_AND_CRC_LENGTH;
191 
192  return status;
193 }
194 
203 STATUS Radar_processData(Radar_EthDataPacketPrms *pDataPacket_ptr, UINT32 prmSize)
204 {
205  INT32 status = SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK;
206  UINT16 calculatedCrc, receivedCrc;
207 
208  if (pDataPacket_ptr->syncByte != RX_SYNC_BYTE)
209  {
210  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Received wrong sync byte %x\n", pDataPacket_ptr->syncByte);
211  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
212  }
213 
214  status = Bsp_ar12xxComputeCrc((UINT8 *)((UINT8 *)pDataPacket_ptr + 2),
215  (prmSize - HEADER_AND_CRC_LENGTH), RL_CRC_TYPE_16BIT_CCITT,
216  (UINT8 *)&calculatedCrc);
217  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
218  {
219  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: CRC calculation failed\n");
220  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
221  }
222 
223  receivedCrc = *(UINT16 *)((UINT8 *)pDataPacket_ptr + prmSize - 2);
224  if (calculatedCrc != receivedCrc)
225  {
226  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: CRC did not match. Received CRC : %x\n", receivedCrc);
227  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
228  }
229 
230  switch (pDataPacket_ptr->opcode)
231  {
232  case CAPTURE_RESPONSE_ACK:
233  /* Received ACK Response from the TDA */
234  {
235  if (pDataPacket_ptr->ackCode == CAPTURE_CONFIG_TRACE_START)
236  {
237  TDA_StartTraceACK = 1;
238  gTDACARD_Callback((UINT16)pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection, \
239  pDataPacket_ptr->opcode, \
240  pDataPacket_ptr->ackCode, status, NULL);
241  }
242  else if (pDataPacket_ptr->ackCode == SENSOR_CONFIG_SPI_WRITE)
243  {
244  /* Received Host IRQ low */
245  if (pDataPacket_ptr->ackType == ACK_ON_PROCESS)
246  {
247  int dev_id = getDevIdFromDevMap(pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection);
248  DEBUG_PRINT("# INFO: Received HOST_IRQ_LOW command from device %d\n", \
249  dev_id);
250  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t *)TDAGetDeviceCtx(dev_id);
251  pDevCtx->hostIrqRxHigh = 0;
252  }
253  }
254  else
255  {
256  gTDACARD_Callback((UINT16)pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection, \
257  pDataPacket_ptr->opcode, \
258  pDataPacket_ptr->ackCode, status, NULL);
259  }
260  break;
261  }
262  case CAPTURE_RESPONSE_NACK:
263  /* Received NACK Response from the TDA */
264  {
265  int dev_id = getDevIdFromDevMap(pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection);
266  DEBUG_PRINT("# INFO: Received CAPTURE_RESPONSE_NACK command from device %d\n", \
267  dev_id);
268  gTDACARD_Callback((UINT16)pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection, \
269  pDataPacket_ptr->opcode, \
270  pDataPacket_ptr->ackCode, status, NULL);
271  break;
272  }
273  case CAPTURE_RESPONSE_VERSION_INFO:
274  /* Received Version Information from TDA */
275  {
276  DEBUG_PRINT("# INFO: Received CAPTURE_RESPONSE_VERSION_INFO command with TDA Binary Version : %s\n", \
277  pDataPacket_ptr->data);
278  TDA_GetVersionACK = 1;
279  gTDACARD_Callback((UINT16)pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection, \
280  pDataPacket_ptr->opcode, \
281  pDataPacket_ptr->ackCode, status, pDataPacket_ptr->data);
282  break;
283  }
284  case CAPTURE_RESPONSE_CONFIG_INFO:
285  /* Received Capture Config Information from TDA */
286  {
287  int dev_id = getDevIdFromDevMap(pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection);
288  DEBUG_PRINT("# INFO: Received CAPTURE_RESPONSE_CONFIG_INFO command from device %d with Width = %d and Height = %d\n", \
289  dev_id, ((captureConfig_t*)pDataPacket_ptr->data)->width, \
290  ((captureConfig_t*)pDataPacket_ptr->data)->height);
291  gTDACARD_Callback((UINT16)pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection, \
292  pDataPacket_ptr->opcode, \
293  pDataPacket_ptr->ackCode, status, (captureConfig_t*)pDataPacket_ptr->data);
294  break;
295  }
296  case CAPTURE_RESPONSE_TRACE_DATA:
297  /* Received Trace data Response from TDA */
298  {
299  DEBUG_PRINT("# INFO: Received ACK for Stop Trace command \n");
300  gTDACARD_Callback((UINT16)pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection, \
301  pDataPacket_ptr->opcode, \
302  pDataPacket_ptr->ackCode, status, NULL);
303  break;
304  }
305  case CAPTURE_RESPONSE_GPIO_DATA:
306  /* Received GPIO data */
307  {
308  int dev_id = getDevIdFromDevMap(pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection);
309  DEBUG_PRINT("# INFO: Received CAPTURE_RESPONSE_GPIO_DATA command from device %d with GPIO Pin = %d and GPIO data = %d\n", \
310  dev_id, ((s_gpioConfig_t*)pDataPacket_ptr->data)->gpioPin, \
311  ((s_gpioConfig_t*)pDataPacket_ptr->data)->gpioValue);
312  gTDACARD_Callback((UINT16)pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection, \
313  pDataPacket_ptr->opcode, \
314  pDataPacket_ptr->ackCode, status, (s_gpioConfig_t*)pDataPacket_ptr->data);
315  break;
316  }
317  case CAPTURE_RESPONSE_HOST_IRQ:
318  /* Indicates HOST IRQ from AWR device */
319  {
320  int dev_id = getDevIdFromDevMap(pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection);
321  DEBUG_PRINT("# INFO: Received HOST_IRQ_HIGH command from device %d\n", \
322  dev_id);
323  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t *)TDAGetDeviceCtx(dev_id);
324  if (pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.eventHandle != NULL)
325  {
326  SetEvent(pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.eventHandle);
327  }
328  pDevCtx->hostIrqRxHigh = 1;
329  break;
330  }
331  case SENSOR_RESPONSE_SPI_DATA:
332  /* Received SPI data from the AWR device */
333  {
334  int dev_id = getDevIdFromDevMap(pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection);
335  gSpiRxLength[dev_id] = pDataPacket_ptr->dataLength - DATA_HEADER_LENGTH;
336  memcpy(gSpiRxData[dev_id], pDataPacket_ptr->data, gSpiRxLength[dev_id]);
337  gSpiRxSignal[dev_id] = 1;
338  break;
339  }
340  case SENSOR_RESPONSE_SOP_INFO:
341  /* Received SOP info of the AWR device */
342  {
343  int dev_id = getDevIdFromDevMap(pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection);
344  DEBUG_PRINT("# INFO: Received SENSOR_RESPONSE_SOP_INFO command from device %d with SOP Mode = %d\n", \
345  dev_id, *((UINT32*)pDataPacket_ptr->data));
346  gTDACARD_Callback((UINT16)pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection, \
347  pDataPacket_ptr->opcode, \
348  pDataPacket_ptr->ackCode, status, (UINT32*)pDataPacket_ptr->data);
349  break;
350  }
351  default:
352  /* Received unknown command */
353  {
354  int dev_id = getDevIdFromDevMap(pDataPacket_ptr->devSelection);
355  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Unknown command received from device %d\n", dev_id);
356  break;
357  }
358  }
359 
360  return status;
361 }
362 
372 STATUS ethernetConnect(unsigned char *ipAddr, UINT32 configPort, UINT32 deviceMap)
373 {
374  INT32 status = SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK;
375 
376  // Initializing Network parameters
377  memset(&gNetworkTDA_obj, 0, sizeof(gNetworkTDA_obj));
378  if (configPort != 0)
379  {
380  gNetworkTDA_obj.serverPort = configPort;
381  }
382  else
383  {
384  gNetworkTDA_obj.serverPort = NETWORK_TDA_SERVER_PORT;
385  }
386 
387  strcpy_s(gNetworkTDA_obj.ipAddr, _countof(gNetworkTDA_obj.ipAddr), ipAddr);
388 
389  //Initializing sockets
390  Network_init();
391 
392  //Connecting to the server
393  status = ConnectToServer();
394  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
395  {
396  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Connecting to the server failed\n");
397  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
398  }
399 
400  InitializeCriticalSection(&gNetwork_Write_cs);
401 
402  //Create Rx thread
403  DWORD(WINAPI *pwaitConnect) (LPVOID) = NULL;
404  pwaitConnect = Network_waitConnect;
405 
406  gThreadHdl = CreateThread(NULL, 0, pwaitConnect, &gNetwork_SockObj, \
407  0, NULL);
408 
409  /* wait for the thread to start */
410  while (TDA_NetworkThreadRunning == 0)
411  {
412  Sleep(1);
413  }
414 
415  //Send Ping command to check the validity of network connection
416  status = IsConnected();
417  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
418  {
419  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: PING command failed\n");
420  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
421  }
422 
423  //Send trace command for logging all messages between TDA and mmWaveStudio
424  char traceBuff[100];
425  SYSTEMTIME SystemTime;
426  GetLocalTime(&SystemTime);
427  /* Generate unique trace name */
428  sprintf(traceBuff, "Trace_TDA_[%02d_%02d_%04d_%02d.%02d].txt", SystemTime.wDay, \
429  SystemTime.wMonth, SystemTime.wYear, SystemTime.wHour, SystemTime.wMinute);
430  status = startTrace(traceBuff);
431  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
432  {
433  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: TRACE command failed\n");
434  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
435  }
436 
437  /* wait for the ACK to be received for Trace command */
438  int cmdCount = 0;
439  TDA_StartTraceACK = 0;
440  while (TDA_StartTraceACK == 0)
441  {
442  Sleep(1);
443  cmdCount++;
444  /* 3 seconds timeout */
445  if (cmdCount > 3000)
446  {
447  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: No ACK received for TRACE command\n");
448  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
449  }
450  }
451 
452  //Send TDA version command
453  status = readDLLVersion();
454  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
455  {
456  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: TDA version command failed\n");
457  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
458  }
459 
460  /* wait for the ACK to be received for TDA version command */
461  cmdCount = 0;
462  TDA_GetVersionACK = 0;
463  while (TDA_GetVersionACK == 0)
464  {
465  Sleep(1);
466  cmdCount++;
467  /* 3 seconds timeout */
468  if (cmdCount > 3000)
469  {
470  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: No ACK received for TDA version command\n");
471  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
472  }
473  }
474 
475  //Send the devices to be enabled for configuration and capture
476  status = ConfigureDeviceMap(deviceMap);
477  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
478  {
479  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Configure DeviceMap command failed\n");
480  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
481  }
482 
483  Sleep(50);
484 
485  //Initialize the GPIO and other peripherals
486  pDataPacket[4].ackType = ACK_ON_PROCESS;
487  pDataPacket[4].devSelection = 1;
488  status = Radar_formEthDataPacket(&pDataPacket[4], &pDevCtrlPrms[4],
489  CAPTURE_CONFIG_CONNECT, DATA_HEADER_LENGTH,
490  NULL);
491  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
492  {
493  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Ethernet packet formation failed\n");
494  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
495  }
496 
497  /* Create data buffer and print it into file */
498  char tempBuff[2048] = { 0 };
499  int offset = 0;
500  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParamSize; i++)
501  {
502  int j = 0;
503  j = sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "0x%02X ", pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParam[i]);
504  offset = offset + j;
505  }
506  sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "\r\n");
507  DEBUG_PRINT("[GN]%s", tempBuff);
508 
509  handleDevCtrl((UINT8*)&pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParam, pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParamSize);
510  return status;
511 }
512 
519 STATUS ethernetDisconnect()
520 {
521  INT32 status = SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK;
522 
523  //Deinitialize the GPIO and other peripherals
524  pDataPacket[4].ackType = ACK_ON_RECEIVE;
525  pDataPacket[4].devSelection = 1;
526  status = Radar_formEthDataPacket(&pDataPacket[4], &pDevCtrlPrms[4],
527  CAPTURE_CONFIG_DISCONNECT, DATA_HEADER_LENGTH,
528  NULL);
529  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
530  {
531  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Ethernet packet formation failed\n");
532  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
533  }
534 
535  /* Create data buffer and print it into file */
536  char tempBuff[2048] = { 0 };
537  int offset = 0;
538  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParamSize; i++)
539  {
540  int j = 0;
541  j = sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "0x%02X ", pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParam[i]);
542  offset = offset + j;
543  }
544  sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "\r\n");
545  DEBUG_PRINT("[GN]%s", tempBuff);
546 
547  handleDevCtrl((UINT8*)&pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParam, pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParamSize);
548 
549  /* Send the stop trace command to close the trace file */
550  status = stopTrace();
551  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
552  {
553  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Stop Trace command failed\n");
554  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
555  }
556 
557  Sleep(1000);
558 
559  // Disable the Rx thread
560  TDA_NetworkThreadRunning = 0;
561 
562  Sleep(1000);
563 
564  /* Close the socket */
565  status = CloseConnection();
566  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
567  {
568  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
569  }
570 
571  /* Terminates socket operations for all threads */
572  status = Network_deInit();
573 
574  /* Close the file handle for trace */
575  CloseTraceFile();
576 
577  DeleteCriticalSection(&gNetwork_Write_cs);
578  return status;
579 }
580 
587 STATUS IsConnected()
588 {
589  INT32 status = SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK;
590  pDataPacket[4].ackType = ACK_ON_RECEIVE;
591  pDataPacket[4].devSelection = 32;
592  status = Radar_formEthDataPacket(&pDataPacket[4], &pDevCtrlPrms[4],
593  CAPTURE_CONFIG_PING, DATA_HEADER_LENGTH,
594  NULL);
595  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
596  {
597  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Ethernet packet formation failed\n");
598  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
599  }
600 
601  /* Create data buffer and print it into file */
602  char tempBuff[2048] = { 0 };
603  int offset = 0;
604  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParamSize; i++)
605  {
606  int j = 0;
607  j = sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "0x%02X ", pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParam[i]);
608  offset = offset + j;
609  }
610  sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "\r\n");
611  DEBUG_PRINT("[GN]%s", tempBuff);
612 
613  handleDevCtrl((UINT8*)&pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParam, pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParamSize);
614  return status;
615 }
616 
624 STATUS ConfigureDeviceMap(UINT32 deviceMap)
625 {
626  INT32 status = SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK;
627  pDataPacket[4].ackType = ACK_ON_RECEIVE;
628  pDataPacket[4].devSelection = 32;
629 
630  DEBUG_PRINT("# INFO: Sending Device Map of %d\n", deviceMap);
631 
632  if ((deviceMap & 0x1) == 1)
633  gDeviceMapParams.isMasterEnable = 1;
634  else
635  gDeviceMapParams.isMasterEnable = 0;
636 
637  if ((deviceMap & 0x2) == 2)
638  gDeviceMapParams.isSlave1Enable = 1;
639  else
640  gDeviceMapParams.isSlave1Enable = 0;
641 
642  if ((deviceMap & 0x4) == 4)
643  gDeviceMapParams.isSlave2Enable = 1;
644  else
645  gDeviceMapParams.isSlave2Enable = 0;
646 
647  if ((deviceMap & 0x8) == 8)
648  gDeviceMapParams.isSlave3Enable = 1;
649  else
650  gDeviceMapParams.isSlave3Enable = 0;
651 
652  gDeviceMapParams.numDevice = gDeviceMapParams.isMasterEnable + \
653  gDeviceMapParams.isSlave1Enable + \
654  gDeviceMapParams.isSlave2Enable + \
655  gDeviceMapParams.isSlave3Enable;
656  status = Radar_formEthDataPacket(&pDataPacket[4], &pDevCtrlPrms[4],
657  CAPTURE_CONFIG_DEVICE_MAP, DATA_HEADER_LENGTH + sizeof(gDeviceMapParams),
658  (UINT8*)&gDeviceMapParams);
659  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
660  {
661  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Ethernet packet formation failed\n");
662  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
663  }
664 
665  /* Create data buffer and print it into file */
666  char tempBuff[2048] = { 0 };
667  int offset = 0;
668  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParamSize; i++)
669  {
670  int j = 0;
671  j = sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "0x%02X ", pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParam[i]);
672  offset = offset + j;
673  }
674  sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "\r\n");
675  DEBUG_PRINT("[GN]%s", tempBuff);
676 
677  handleDevCtrl((UINT8*)&pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParam, pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParamSize);
678  return status;
679 }
680 
687 STATUS TDACreateApplication()
688 {
689  INT32 status = SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK;
690  pDataPacket[4].ackType = ACK_ON_PROCESS;
691  pDataPacket[4].devSelection = 32;
692  status = Radar_formEthDataPacket(&pDataPacket[4], &pDevCtrlPrms[4],
693  CAPTURE_CONFIG_CREATE_APPLICATION, DATA_HEADER_LENGTH,
694  NULL);
695  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
696  {
697  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Ethernet packet formation failed\n");
698  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
699  }
700 
701  /* Create data buffer and print it into file */
702  char tempBuff[2048] = { 0 };
703  int offset = 0;
704  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParamSize; i++)
705  {
706  int j = 0;
707  j = sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "0x%02X ", pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParam[i]);
708  offset = offset + j;
709  }
710  sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "\r\n");
711  DEBUG_PRINT("[GN]%s", tempBuff);
712 
713  handleDevCtrl((UINT8*)&pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParam, pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParamSize);
714  return status;
715 }

798 STATUS setWidthAndHeight(UINT8 devSelection, UINT32 width, UINT32 height)
799 {

802  pDataPacket[devId].ackType = ACK_ON_PROCESS;
803  pDataPacket[devId].devSelection = devSelection;
804 
805  gCaptureConfigParams.width = width;
806  gCaptureConfigParams.height = height;
807 
808  status = Radar_formEthDataPacket(&pDataPacket[devId], &pDevCtrlPrms[devId],
809  CAPTURE_CONFIG_CONFIG_SET, DATA_HEADER_LENGTH + sizeof(gCaptureConfigParams),
810  (UINT8*)&gCaptureConfigParams);
811  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
812  {
813  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Ethernet packet formation failed\n");
814  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
815  }

819  int offset = 0;
820  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pDevCtrlPrms[devId].respParamSize; i++)
821  {
822  int j = 0;
823  j = sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "0x%02X ", pDevCtrlPrms[devId].respParam[i]);
824  offset = offset + j;
825  }
826  sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "\r\n");
827  DEBUG_PRINT("[GN]%s", tempBuff);
828 
829  handleDevCtrl((UINT8*)&pDevCtrlPrms[devId].respParam, pDevCtrlPrms[devId].respParamSize);
830  return status;
831 }

871 
884 STATUS TDAregisterCallback(UINT8 devSelection, EVENT_HANDLER RF_EventCallback, void* pValue)
885 {
886  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx;
887  pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t *)TDAGetDeviceCtx(devSelection);
888 
889  if (RF_EventCallback == NULL)
890  {
891  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Invalid Callback from mmWaveLink\n");
892  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
893  }
894 
895  TDALockDevice(pDevCtx);
896 
897  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.handler = RF_EventCallback;
898  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.pValue = pValue;
899 
900  TDAUnlockDevice(pDevCtx);
901 
902  if (pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl != NULL)
903  {
904  TDAStopIrqPollingThread(pDevCtx);
905  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl = NULL;
906  }
907  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
908 }
909 
917 STATUS registerTDAStatusCallback(TDA_EVENT_HANDLER TDACard_EventCallback)
918 {
919  INT32 status = SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK;
920 
921  if (TDACard_EventCallback == NULL)
922  {
923  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Invalid Callback for mmWaveStudio\n");
924  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
925  }
926 
927  gTDACARD_Callback = TDACard_EventCallback;
928 
929  return status;
930 }

941 {
942  INT32 status = SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK;

946  (UINT16)strlen(filename));
947  status = Radar_formEthDataPacket(&pDataPacket[4], &pDevCtrlPrms[4],
948  CAPTURE_CONFIG_TRACE_START, DATA_HEADER_LENGTH + (UINT16)strlen(filename),
949  (UINT8*)filename);
950  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
951  {
952  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Ethernet packet formation failed\n");
953  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
954  }

960  {
961  int j = 0;
962  j = sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "0x%02X ", pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParam[i]);
963  offset = offset + j;
964  }
965  sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "\r\n");
966  DEBUG_PRINT("[GN]%s", tempBuff);
967 
968  handleDevCtrl((UINT8*)&pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParam, pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParamSize);
969  return status;

1231 
1242 STATUS spiWriteToDevice(TDADevHandle_t hdl, unsigned char *data, unsigned short ByteCount)
1243 {
1244  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t*)hdl;
1245  TDALockDevice(pDevCtx);
1246  UINT8 devSelection = createDevMapFromDevId(pDevCtx->deviceIndex);
1247  INT32 status = SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK;
1248  pDataPacket[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].devSelection = devSelection;
1249 
1250  magicWord = data[0] + (data[1] << 8) + (data[2] << 16) + (data[3] << 24);
1251  if (magicWord == 0x43211234)
1252  {
1253  /* Other than CNYS pattern messages */
1254  pDataPacket[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].ackType = ACK_ON_RECEIVE;
1255  }
1256  else
1257  {
1258  /* CNYS pattern messages */
1259  pDataPacket[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].ackType = ACK_ON_PROCESS;
1260  }
1261 
1262  status = Radar_formEthDataPacket(&pDataPacket[pDevCtx->deviceIndex], \
1263  &pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex], \
1264  SENSOR_CONFIG_SPI_WRITE, DATA_HEADER_LENGTH + ByteCount,
1265  (UINT8*)data);
1266  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
1267  {
1268  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Ethernet packet formation failed\n");
1269  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
1270  }
1271 
1272  handleDevCtrl((UINT8*)&pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].respParam, \
1273  pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].respParamSize);
1274 
1275  TDAUnlockDevice(pDevCtx);
1276 
1277  /* Create data buffer and print it into file */
1278  char tempBuff[2048] = { 0 };
1279  int offset = 0;
1280  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].respParamSize; i = i + 2)
1281  {
1282  int j = 0;
1283  j = sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "0x%02X%02X ", \
1284  pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].respParam[i + 1], \
1285  pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].respParam[i]);
1286  offset = offset + j;
1287  }
1288  sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "\r\n");
1289  DEBUG_PRINT("Device [%d] [WR]%s", pDevCtx->deviceIndex, tempBuff);
1290 
1291  return ByteCount;
1292 }
1293 
1304 STATUS spiReadFromDevice(TDADevHandle_t hdl, unsigned char *data, unsigned short ByteCount)
1305 {
1306  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t*)hdl;
1307  TDALockDevice(pDevCtx);
1308  UINT8 devSelection = createDevMapFromDevId(pDevCtx->deviceIndex);
1309  INT32 status = SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK;
1310 
1311  pDataPacket[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].devSelection = devSelection;
1312  pDataPacket[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].ackType = ACK_ON_PROCESS;
1313  status = Radar_formEthDataPacket(&pDataPacket[pDevCtx->deviceIndex], \
1314  &pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex], \
1315  SENSOR_CONFIG_SPI_READ, DATA_HEADER_LENGTH + sizeof(ByteCount),
1316  (UINT8*)&ByteCount);
1317  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
1318  {
1319  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Ethernet packet formation failed\n");
1320  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
1321  }
1322  handleDevCtrl((UINT8*)&pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].respParam, \
1323  pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].respParamSize);
1324 
1325  //Wait till data is read by TDA
1326  while (gSpiRxSignal[pDevCtx->deviceIndex] == 0)
1327  {
1328  Sleep(1);
1329  }
1330 
1331  if (gSpiRxSignal[pDevCtx->deviceIndex] == 1)
1332  {
1333  (void)memcpy(data, gSpiRxData[pDevCtx->deviceIndex], \
1334  gSpiRxLength[pDevCtx->deviceIndex]);
1335  gSpiRxSignal[pDevCtx->deviceIndex] = 0;
1336  }
1337 
1338  TDAUnlockDevice(pDevCtx);
1339 
1340  /* Create data buffer and print it into file */
1341  char tempBuff[2048] = { 0 };
1342  int offset = 0;
1343  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < gSpiRxLength[pDevCtx->deviceIndex]; i = i + 2)
1344  {
1345  int j = 0;
1346  j = sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "0x%02X%02X ", \
1347  *(gSpiRxData[pDevCtx->deviceIndex] + i + 1), \
1348  *(gSpiRxData[pDevCtx->deviceIndex] + i));
1349  offset = offset + j;
1350  }
1351  sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "\r\n");
1352  DEBUG_PRINT("Device [%d] [RD]%s", pDevCtx->deviceIndex, tempBuff);
1353 
1354  return gSpiRxLength[pDevCtx->deviceIndex];
1355 }
1356 
1364 STATUS resetDevice(TDADevHandle_t hdl)
1365 {
1366  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t*)hdl;
1367  UINT8 devSelection = createDevMapFromDevId(pDevCtx->deviceIndex);
1368  INT32 status = SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK;
1369  pDataPacket[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].devSelection = devSelection;
1370  pDataPacket[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].ackType = ACK_ON_PROCESS;
1371  status = Radar_formEthDataPacket(&pDataPacket[pDevCtx->deviceIndex], \
1372  &pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex], \
1373  SENSOR_CONFIG_DEVICE_RESET, DATA_HEADER_LENGTH,
1374  NULL);
1375  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
1376  {
1377  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Ethernet packet formation failed\n");
1378  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
1379  }
1380 
1381  /* Create data buffer and print it into file */
1382  char tempBuff[2048] = { 0 };
1383  int offset = 0;
1384  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].respParamSize; i++)
1385  {
1386  int j = 0;
1387  j = sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "0x%02X ", \
1388  pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].respParam[i]);
1389  offset = offset + j;
1390  }
1391  sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "\r\n");
1392  DEBUG_PRINT("Device [%d] [GN]%s", pDevCtx->deviceIndex, tempBuff);
1393 
1394  handleDevCtrl((UINT8*)&pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].respParam, \
1395  pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].respParamSize);
1396  return status;
1397 }
1398 
1407 STATUS setSOPMode(TDADevHandle_t hdl, UINT32 SOPmode)
1408 {
1409  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t*)hdl;
1410  UINT8 devSelection = createDevMapFromDevId(pDevCtx->deviceIndex);
1411  INT32 status = SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK;
1412  pDataPacket[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].devSelection = devSelection;
1413  pDataPacket[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].ackType = ACK_ON_PROCESS;
1414  status = Radar_formEthDataPacket(&pDataPacket[pDevCtx->deviceIndex], \
1415  &pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex], \
1416  SENSOR_CONFIG_SET_SOP, DATA_HEADER_LENGTH + sizeof(SOPmode),
1417  (UINT8*)&SOPmode);
1418  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
1419  {
1420  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Ethernet packet formation failed\n");
1421  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
1422  }
1423 
1424  /* Create data buffer and print it into file */
1425  char tempBuff[2048] = { 0 };
1426  int offset = 0;
1427  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].respParamSize; i++)
1428  {
1429  int j = 0;
1430  j = sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "0x%02X ", \
1431  pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].respParam[i]);
1432  offset = offset + j;
1433  }
1434  sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "\r\n");
1435  DEBUG_PRINT("Device [%d] [GN]%s", pDevCtx->deviceIndex, tempBuff);
1436 
1437  handleDevCtrl((UINT8*)&pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].respParam, \
1438  pDevCtrlPrms[pDevCtx->deviceIndex].respParamSize);
1439  return status;
1440 }

1522  {

1597 STATUS startRecord()
1598 {
1599  INT32 status = SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK;
1600  pDataPacket[4].ackType = ACK_ON_PROCESS;
1601  pDataPacket[4].devSelection = 32;
1602  status = Radar_formEthDataPacket(&pDataPacket[4], &pDevCtrlPrms[4],
1603  CAPTURE_DATA_START_RECORD, DATA_HEADER_LENGTH,
1604  NULL);
1605  if (status != SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_SOK)
1606  {
1607  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Ethernet packet formation failed\n");
1608  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;
1609  }
1610 
1611  /* Create data buffer and print it into file */
1612  char tempBuff[2048] = { 0 };
1613  int offset = 0;
1614  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParamSize; i++)
1615  {
1616  int j = 0;
1617  j = sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "0x%02X ", pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParam[i]);
1618  offset = offset + j;
1619  }
1620  sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "\r\n");
1621  DEBUG_PRINT("[GN]%s", tempBuff);
1622 
1623  handleDevCtrl((UINT8*)&pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParam, pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParamSize);
1624  return status;
1625 }
1626

1642  {
1643  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Ethernet packet formation failed\n");
1644  return SYSTEM_LINK_STATUS_EFAIL;

1648  char tempBuff[2048] = { 0 };
1649  int offset = 0;
1650  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParamSize; i++)
1651  {
1652  int j = 0;
1653  j = sprintf(&tempBuff[offset], "0x%02X ", pDevCtrlPrms[4].respParam[i]);
1654  offset = offset + j;

1658

1663 /********************** mmWaveLink Hooks related functions *******************/
1664 
1665 TDADevCtx_t* TDAInitDeviceCtx(unsigned char ucDevId)
1666 {
1667  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx = NULL;
1668 
1669  if (ucDevId <= TDA_NUM_CONNECTED_DEVICES_MAX)
1670  {
1671  pDevCtx = &(gTDA_devCtx[ucDevId]);
1672  pDevCtx->deviceIndex = ucDevId;
1673  pDevCtx->deviceEnabled = FALSE;
1674  pDevCtx->irqMasked = FALSE;
1675  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl = 0;
1676  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadID = 0;
1677  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.handler = 0;
1678  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.pValue = 0;
1679  InitializeCriticalSection(&(pDevCtx->cs));
1680  }
1681 
1682  return pDevCtx;
1683 }
1684 
1685 int TDAClearDeviceCtx(TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx)
1686 {
1687  int retVal = RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
1688 
1689  if (pDevCtx != NULL)
1690  {
1691  /* Delete Critical Section */
1692  DeleteCriticalSection(&(pDevCtx->cs));
1693  /* Clear device context */
1694  pDevCtx->deviceEnabled = FALSE;
1695  retVal = RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
1696  }
1697 
1698  return retVal;
1699 }
1700 
1701 TDADevHandle_t TDAGetDeviceCtx(unsigned char ucDevId)
1702 {
1703  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx = NULL;
1704 
1705  if (ucDevId <= TDA_NUM_CONNECTED_DEVICES_MAX)
1706  {
1707  pDevCtx = &(gTDA_devCtx[ucDevId]);
1708  pDevCtx->deviceIndex = ucDevId;
1709  }
1710 
1711  return (TDADevHandle_t)pDevCtx;
1712 }
1713 
1714 TDADevHandle_t TDACommOpen(unsigned char deviceIndex, unsigned int flags)
1715 {
1716  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx;
1717 
1718  pDevCtx = TDAInitDeviceCtx(deviceIndex);
1719 
1720  if (NULL != pDevCtx)
1721  {
1722  IGNORE_WARNING_UNUSED_VAR(flags);
1723  return (TDADevHandle_t)pDevCtx;
1724  }
1725 
1726  return NULL;
1727 }
1728 
1729 int TDACommClose(TDADevHandle_t hdl)
1730 {
1731  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t*)hdl;
1732 
1733  TDACloseDevice(pDevCtx);
1734 
1735  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
1736 }
1737 
1738 int TDACloseDevice(TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx)
1739 {
1740  int error = RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
1741  unsigned char Continue = 0;
1742 
1743  if (pDevCtx == NULL)
1744  {
1745  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
1746  }
1747 
1748  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
1749 }
1750 
1751 DWORD WINAPI TDAHostIrqThread(LPVOID pParam)
1752 {
1753  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t*)pParam;
1754  TDA_HostIntrThreadLoop[pDevCtx->deviceIndex] = 1;
1755  TDA_NumOfRunningSPIThreads++;
1756 
1757  while (TDA_HostIntrThreadLoop[pDevCtx->deviceIndex])
1758  {
1759  WaitForSingleObject(pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.eventHandle, INFINITE);
1760  if ((!pDevCtx->deviceEnabled) || (NULL == pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.handler) || \
1761  (pDevCtx->irqMasked))
1762  {
1763  continue;
1764  }
1765  else
1766  {
1767  ResetEvent(pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.eventHandle);
1768  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.handler(pDevCtx->deviceIndex, (TDADevHandle_t)pDevCtx);
1769  }
1770 
1771  }
1772  TDA_NumOfRunningSPIThreads--;
1773  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
1774 }
1775 
1776 int TDADisableDeviceThread(unsigned char deviceIndex)
1777 {
1778  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx;
1779  pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t *)TDAGetDeviceCtx(deviceIndex);
1780  pDevCtx->deviceEnabled = FALSE;
1781 
1782  if (pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl != NULL)
1783  {
1784  TDA_HostIntrThreadLoop[pDevCtx->deviceIndex] = 0;
1785  /* send a summy event to unblock the thread */
1786  SetEvent(pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.eventHandle);
1787  /* Wait for polling thread to terminate */
1788  WaitForSingleObject(pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl, INFINITE);
1789  CloseHandle(pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.eventHandle);
1790  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.eventHandle = NULL;
1791  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl = NULL;
1792 
1793  }
1794 
1795  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
1796 }
1797 
1798 int TDAEnableDeviceThread(unsigned char deviceIndex)
1799 {
1800  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx;
1801  int retVal = RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
1802 
1803  pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t *)TDAGetDeviceCtx(deviceIndex);
1804  if (NULL != pDevCtx)
1805  {
1806  /* if the device is already enabled return */
1807  if (pDevCtx->deviceEnabled == TRUE)
1808  {
1809  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
1810  }
1811 
1812  pDevCtx->deviceEnabled = TRUE;
1813  /* Starting Interrupt Thread after Power on to avoid Spurious Interrupt */
1814  if (NULL != pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.handler)
1815  {
1816  TDA_HostIntrThreadLoop[pDevCtx->deviceIndex] = 0;
1817  if (pDevCtx->hostIrqRxHigh == 1)
1818  {
1819  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.eventHandle = CreateEvent(NULL, TRUE, TRUE, NULL);
1820  }
1821  else
1822  {
1823  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.eventHandle = CreateEvent(NULL, TRUE, FALSE, NULL);
1824  }
1825  /* Create Host IRQ Polling Thread */
1826  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl = CreateThread(NULL, 0, TDAHostIrqThread, \
1827  pDevCtx, 0, &pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadID);
1828  /* wait for the thread to start */
1829  while (TDA_HostIntrThreadLoop[pDevCtx->deviceIndex] == 0)
1830  {
1831  Sleep(1);
1832  }
1833 
1834  retVal = RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
1835  }
1836  }
1837  else
1838  {
1839  retVal = RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
1840  }
1841 
1842  return retVal;
1843 }
1844 
1845 int TDADisableDevice(unsigned char deviceIndex)
1846 {
1847  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx;
1848  pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t *)TDAGetDeviceCtx(deviceIndex);
1849  pDevCtx->deviceEnabled = FALSE;
1850 
1851  if (pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl != NULL)
1852  {
1853  TDAStopIrqPollingThread(pDevCtx);
1854  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl = NULL;
1855  }
1856 
1857  Sleep(200);
1858 
1859  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
1860 }
1861 
1862 int TDAEnableDevice(unsigned char deviceIndex)
1863 {
1864  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx;
1865  int retVal = RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
1866 
1867  pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t *)TDAGetDeviceCtx(deviceIndex);
1868 
1869  if (NULL != pDevCtx)
1870  {
1871  pDevCtx->deviceEnabled = TRUE;
1872  /* Starting Interrupt Thread after Power on to avoid Spurious Interrupt */
1873  if (NULL != pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.handler)
1874  {
1875  TDAStartIrqPollingThread(pDevCtx);
1876  }
1877  }
1878  else
1879  {
1880  retVal = RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
1881  }
1882 
1883  return retVal;
1884 }
1885 
1886 int TDALockDevice(TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx)
1887 {
1888  EnterCriticalSection(&pDevCtx->cs);
1889  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
1890 }
1891 
1892 int TDAUnlockDevice(TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx)
1893 {
1894  LeaveCriticalSection(&pDevCtx->cs);
1895  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
1896 }
1897 
1898 void TDACommIRQMask(TDADevHandle_t hdl)
1899 {
1900  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t *)hdl;
1901 
1902  TDALockDevice(pDevCtx);
1903  pDevCtx->irqMasked = TRUE;
1904  TDAUnlockDevice(pDevCtx);
1905 }
1906 
1907 void TDACommIRQUnMask(TDADevHandle_t hdl)
1908 {
1909  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t *)hdl;
1910 
1911  TDALockDevice(pDevCtx);
1912  pDevCtx->irqMasked = FALSE;
1913  TDAUnlockDevice(pDevCtx);
1914 }
1915 
1916 int TDADeviceWaitIrqStatus(TDADevHandle_t hdl, unsigned char level)
1917 {
1918  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t*)hdl;
1919  int loopCount = 0;
1920  int maxLoopCounts = 0xFFFF;
1921 
1922  do
1923  {
1924  Sleep(1);
1925  loopCount++;
1926  } while ((1 == pDevCtx->hostIrqRxHigh) && (loopCount < maxLoopCounts));
1927 
1928  if (pDevCtx->hostIrqRxHigh == 0)
1929  {
1930  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
1931  }
1932  else
1933  {
1934  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
1935  }
1936 }
1937 
1938 int TDAWaitForIrq(TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx)
1939 {
1940  int loopCount = 0;
1941  /* --------------- Important note-----------------------------*/
1942  /* This loop was reduced to 100 to prevent a problem that it has an IRQ ready but it ignores
1943  This loop will cause a fast restart of the IRQ port and will continue normal activity */
1944  int MaxWaitLoops = 1;
1945 
1946  do
1947  {
1948  Sleep(1);
1949  loopCount++;
1950  /* Added this one for letting WIN7 yield for the next thread.
1951  In case we don't have it - the do/while loop will not yield and
1952  we will delay other threads by waiting for this thread */
1953  SwitchToThread();
1954  } while ((0 == pDevCtx->hostIrqRxHigh) && (loopCount < MaxWaitLoops));
1955 
1956  if (pDevCtx->hostIrqRxHigh == 0)
1957  {
1958  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
1959  }
1960 
1961  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
1962 }
1963 
1964 DWORD WINAPI TDAPollingThreadEntrySpi(LPVOID pParam)
1965 {
1966  TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx = (TDADevCtx_t*)pParam;
1967  int waitIrqRes = 0;
1968  unsigned int devPolled = 0;
1969 
1970  TDA_HostIntrThreadLoop[pDevCtx->deviceIndex] = 1;
1971  TDA_NumOfRunningSPIThreads++;
1972 
1973  while (TDA_HostIntrThreadLoop[0])
1974  {
1975  pDevCtx = &gTDA_devCtx[devPolled];
1976  devPolled++;
1977  devPolled = devPolled % TDA_NUM_CONNECTED_DEVICES_MAX;
1978  if (!pDevCtx->deviceEnabled)
1979  {
1980  continue;
1981  }
1982 
1983  /* Wait for Host IRQ */
1984  waitIrqRes = TDAWaitForIrq(pDevCtx);
1985  /* Check if Device is Enabled, IRQ is received and is not in masked State */
1986 
1987  if ((!pDevCtx->deviceEnabled) || (NULL == pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.handler) || \
1988  (pDevCtx->irqMasked) || (0 != waitIrqRes))
1989  {
1990  continue;
1991  }
1992 
1993  /* Check if Interrupt handler is registered */
1994  if (pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.handler)
1995  {
1996  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.handler(pDevCtx->deviceIndex, (TDADevHandle_t)pDevCtx);
1997  }
1998 
1999  if (TDA_NumOfRunningSPIThreads > TDA_NUM_CONNECTED_DEVICES_MAX)
2000  {
2001  TDA_NumOfRunningSPIThreads--;
2002  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl = NULL;
2003  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
2004  }
2005  }
2006  TDA_NumOfRunningSPIThreads--;
2007  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
2008 }
2009 
2010 int TDAStartIrqPollingThread(TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx)
2011 {
2012  int error = RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
2013  DWORD(WINAPI *pPollThreadFunc) (LPVOID) = NULL;
2014  DWORD currThread = GetCurrentThreadId();
2015 
2016  if (pDevCtx->deviceIndex != 0)
2017  {
2018  if (gTDA_devCtx[0].hostIntrThread.threadHdl != 0)
2019  {
2020  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl = gTDA_devCtx[0].hostIntrThread.threadHdl;
2021  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
2022  }
2023  else
2024  {
2025  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
2026  }
2027  }
2028 
2029  TDA_HostIntrThreadLoop[pDevCtx->deviceIndex] = 0;
2030 
2031  /* Host IRQ Polling Thread for SPI */
2032  pPollThreadFunc = TDAPollingThreadEntrySpi;
2033 
2034  if (0 == pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl)
2035  {
2036  /* Create Host IRQ Polling Thread */
2037  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl = CreateThread(NULL, 0, pPollThreadFunc, pDevCtx, 0, \
2038  &pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadID);
2039  }
2040  else
2041  {
2042  TDALockDevice(pDevCtx);
2043  if (pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadID != currThread)
2044  {
2045  TerminateThread(pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl, 0);
2046  Sleep(200);
2047  }
2048 
2049  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl = CreateThread(NULL, 0, pPollThreadFunc, pDevCtx, 0, \
2050  &pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadID);
2051  TDAUnlockDevice(pDevCtx);
2052  }
2053 
2054  /* wait for the thread to start */
2055  while (TDA_HostIntrThreadLoop[pDevCtx->deviceIndex] == 0)
2056  {
2057  Sleep(1);
2058  }
2059 
2060  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
2061 }
2062 
2063 int TDAStopIrqPollingThread(TDADevCtx_t* pDevCtx)
2064 {
2065  int error = RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
2066  DWORD currThread = GetCurrentThreadId();
2067 
2068  if (pDevCtx->deviceIndex != 0)
2069  {
2070  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl = NULL;
2071  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
2072  }
2073 
2074  TDA_HostIntrThreadLoop[pDevCtx->deviceIndex] = 0;
2075 
2076  if (pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl && (pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadID != currThread))
2077  {
2078  /* Wait for polling thread to terminate */
2079  WaitForSingleObject(pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl, INFINITE);
2080  }
2081 
2082  pDevCtx->hostIntrThread.threadHdl = NULL;
2083  gTDA_devCtx[1].hostIntrThread.threadHdl = NULL;
2084  gTDA_devCtx[2].hostIntrThread.threadHdl = NULL;
2085  gTDA_devCtx[3].hostIntrThread.threadHdl = NULL;
2086 
2087  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
2088 }
2089 
2090 unsigned int getDevIdFromDevMap(unsigned int deviceMap)
2091 {
2092  int devInd = 0;
2093  unsigned int devMap = deviceMap;
2094  while (devMap != 0)
2095  {
2096  if ((devMap & 0x1) == 1)
2097  {
2098  break;
2099  }
2100  else
2101  {
2102  devInd++;
2103  }
2104  devMap = (devMap >> 1);
2105  }
2106  return devInd;
2107 }
2108 
2109 unsigned int createDevMapFromDevId(unsigned int deviceId)
2110 {
2111  int devMap = 1 << deviceId;
2112  return devMap;
2113 }

2121  WSADATA wsaData;
2122 
2123  wVersionRequested = MAKEWORD(1, 1);
2124  if (WSAStartup(wVersionRequested, &wsaData)) {
2125  DEBUG_PRINT("\r\nUnable to initialize WinSock for host info");
2126  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2127  }
2128 }
2129 #endif

2134  return 0;

2142 
2143 int Network_connect(Network_SockObj *pObj, char *ipAddr, UINT32 port)
2144 {
2145  int sin_size;
2146  struct hostent *host;
2147  struct sockaddr_in server;
2148 
2149  host = gethostbyname(ipAddr);
2150 
2151  strcpy_s(gNetworkTDA_obj.ipAddr, _countof(gNetworkTDA_obj.ipAddr), ipAddr);
2152 
2153  gNetworkTDA_obj.serverPort = port;
2154 
2155  pObj->clientSocketId = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, IPPROTO_TCP);
2156  if (pObj->clientSocketId == INVALID_SOCKET) {
2157  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: NETWORK: Socket open failed (%s:%d)!!!\n", \
2158  gNetworkTDA_obj.ipAddr, gNetworkTDA_obj.serverPort);
2159  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
2160  }
2161 
2162  int flags = 1;
2163  if (setsockopt(pObj->clientSocketId, IPPROTO_TCP, TCP_NODELAY, (void *)&flags, \
2164  sizeof(flags)))
2165  {
2166  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: setsocketopt(), TCP_NODELAY");
2167  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
2168  };
2169 
2170  int freq = 1; // can be 1..255, default is 2
2171  int bytes;
2172 
2173  #define SIO_TCP_SET_ACK_FREQUENCY _WSAIOW(IOC_VENDOR,23)
2174 
2175  if (WSAIoctl(pObj->clientSocketId, SIO_TCP_SET_ACK_FREQUENCY, &freq, sizeof(freq), \
2176  NULL, 0, &bytes, NULL, NULL))
2177  {
2178  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: WSAIoctl(), SIO_TCP_SET_ACK_FREQUENCY");
2179  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
2180  }
2181 
2182  server.sin_family = AF_INET;
2183  server.sin_port = htons(port);
2184  server.sin_addr = *((struct in_addr *)host->h_addr);
2185  memset(&(server.sin_zero), 0, 8);
2186 
2187  sin_size = sizeof(server);
2188 
2189  if (connect(pObj->clientSocketId, (struct sockaddr *)&server, sin_size) == -1)
2190  {
2191  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: NETWORK: Server connect Failed (%s:%d)!!!\n", \
2192  gNetworkTDA_obj.ipAddr, gNetworkTDA_obj.serverPort);
2193  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
2194  }
2195 
2196  DEBUG_PRINT("# NETWORK: Connected to Server (%s:%d)!!!\n", gNetworkTDA_obj.ipAddr, \
2197  gNetworkTDA_obj.serverPort);
2198 
2199  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
2200 }
2201 
2202 int Network_close(Network_SockObj *pObj)
2203 {
2204  int status = closesocket(pObj->clientSocketId);
2205  if (status != 0)
2206  {
2207  DEBUG_PRINT("ERROR: Closing the socket failed with error: %d\n", WSAGetLastError());
2208  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
2209  }
2210  return status;
2211 }
2212 
2213 int Network_read(Network_SockObj *pObj, UINT8 *dataBuf, UINT32 *dataSize)
2214 {
2215  int actDataSize = 0;
2216  UINT32 tmpDataSize;
2217 
2218  tmpDataSize = *dataSize;
2219 
2220  while (tmpDataSize > 0)
2221  {
2222  actDataSize = recv(pObj->clientSocketId, (void*)dataBuf, tmpDataSize, 0);
2223  if (actDataSize <= 0)
2224  {
2225  *dataSize = 0;
2226  DEBUG_PRINT("ERROR: recv failed in Network_read!\n");
2227  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
2228  }
2229  dataBuf += actDataSize;
2230  tmpDataSize -= actDataSize;
2231  }
2232 
2233  return 0;
2234 }
2235 
2236 int Network_readString(Network_SockObj *pObj, UINT8 *dataBuf, UINT32 maxDataSize)
2237 {
2238  int actDataSize = 0;
2239 
2240  memset(dataBuf, 0, maxDataSize);
2241 
2242  actDataSize = recv(pObj->clientSocketId, (void*)dataBuf, maxDataSize - 1, 0);
2243  if (actDataSize <= 0)
2244  {
2245  dataBuf[0] = 0;
2246  DEBUG_PRINT("ERROR: recv failed in Network_readString!\n");
2247  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
2248  }
2249 
2250  return 0;
2251 }
2252 
2253 int Network_write(Network_SockObj *pObj, UINT8 *dataBuf, UINT32 dataSize)
2254 {
2255  int actDataSize = 0;
2256 
2257  while (dataSize > 0) {
2258  actDataSize = send(pObj->clientSocketId, (void*)dataBuf, dataSize, 0);
2259 
2260  if (actDataSize <= 0)
2261  break;
2262  dataBuf += actDataSize;
2263  dataSize -= actDataSize;
2264  }
2265 
2266  if (dataSize > 0)
2267  {
2268  DEBUG_PRINT("ERROR: send failed in Network_write!\n");
2269  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
2270  }
2271 
2272  return 0;
2273 }
2274 
2275 INT32 Network_waitRead(Network_SockObj *pObj)
2276 {
2277  int status;
2278  fd_set master_set;
2279  struct timeval timeout;
2280 
2281  FD_ZERO(&master_set);
2282  FD_SET(pObj->clientSocketId, &master_set);
2283 
2284  timeout.tv_sec = 0;
2285  timeout.tv_usec = 1000;
2286  status = select(pObj->clientSocketId + 1, &master_set, NULL, NULL, &timeout);
2287 
2288  if (status < 0)
2289  {
2290  DEBUG_PRINT(" NETWORK: Select Failed\n");
2291  status = -1;
2292  }
2293  else if (status == 0)
2294  {
2295  status = 0;
2296  }
2297  else
2298  {
2299  if (FD_ISSET(pObj->clientSocketId, &master_set))
2300  {
2301  status = 1;
2302  }
2303  }
2304 
2305  /* NO connection, retry */
2306  return status;
2307 }
2308 
2309 int ConnectToServer()
2310 {
2311  int status;
2312 
2313  DEBUG_PRINT("# INFO: Network: Connecting to the server %s:%d ...\n", \
2314  gNetworkTDA_obj.ipAddr, gNetworkTDA_obj.serverPort);
2315 
2316  status = Network_connect(&gNetwork_SockObj, gNetworkTDA_obj.ipAddr, \
2317  gNetworkTDA_obj.serverPort);
2318  if (status < 0)
2319  {
2320  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Cannot connect to server\n");
2321  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
2322  }
2323  return status;
2324 }

2326 int CloseConnection()
2327 {
2328  return Network_close(&gNetwork_SockObj);
2329 }
2330 
2331 int SendCommand(void *params, int prmSize)
2332 {
2333  NetworkTDA_CmdHeader cmdHeader;
2334  int status;
2335 
2336  memset(&cmdHeader, 0, sizeof(cmdHeader));
2337 
2338  cmdHeader.prmSize = prmSize;
2339 
2340  if (prmSize == 0)
2341  {
2342  return -1;
2343  }
2344 
2345  status = Network_write(&gNetwork_SockObj, (UINT8*)&cmdHeader, sizeof(cmdHeader));
2346  if (status < 0)
2347  {
2348  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Could not write header\n");
2349  return status;
2350  }
2351 
2352  status = Network_write(&gNetwork_SockObj, (UINT8*)params, prmSize);
2353 
2354  if (status < 0)
2355  {
2356  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Could not send data \n");
2357  return status;
2358  }
2359 
2360  return status;
2361 }
2362 
2363 int RecvResponseParams(UINT8 *pPrm, UINT32 prmSize)
2364 {
2365  int status;
2366 
2367  status = Network_read(&gNetwork_SockObj, pPrm, &prmSize);
2368 
2369  if (status < 0)
2370  {
2371  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Could not receive data \n");
2372  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
2373  }
2374 
2375  return status;
2376 }
2377 
2378 int RecvResponse(UINT32 *prmSize)
2379 {
2380  NetworkTDA_CmdHeader cmdHeader;
2381  UINT32 dataSize;
2382  int status;
2383 
2384  memset(&cmdHeader, 0, sizeof(cmdHeader));
2385 
2386  dataSize = sizeof(cmdHeader);
2387 
2388  status = Network_read(&gNetwork_SockObj, (UINT8*)&cmdHeader, &dataSize);
2389 
2390  if (status < 0)
2391  {
2392  DEBUG_PRINT("# ERROR: Could not read response header\n");
2393  return RLS_RET_CODE_EFAIL;
2394  }
2395 
2396  if (dataSize == 4)
2397  {
2398  *prmSize = cmdHeader.prmSize;
2399  }
2400  return status;
2401 }
2402 
2403 void handleDevCtrl(UINT8 *pDataBuf, UINT32 size)
2404 {
2405  EnterCriticalSection(&gNetwork_Write_cs);
2406  SendCommand(pDataBuf, size);
2407  LeaveCriticalSection(&gNetwork_Write_cs);
2408 }

2671 
2686 int32_t Bsp_ar12xxComputeCrc(uint8_t* wMbDataBaseAdd,
2687  uint32_t hNBytes,
2688  uint8_t crcLen,
2689  uint8_t* outCrc)
2690 {
2691  uint16_t hRemainder = (uint16_t)BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_INITIAL_REMAINDER;
2692  uint64_t lDData;
2693  uint32_t lDData_temp;
2694 
2695  uint16_t hIndex;
2696  uint16_t hNDoubleWords;
2697  uint8_t cNRemainderBytes;
2698  uint8_t cData;
2699  uint8_t cByte;
2700  int32_t retVal = BSP_SOK;
2701 
2702  /* The length can not be zero */
2703  if (BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_ZERO == hNBytes)
2704  {
2705  retVal = BSP_EBADARGS;
2706  }
2707  if (retVal == BSP_SOK)
2708  {
2709  /* To reduce MB access time perform 32 bit bus access at a time */
2710  /* Num of double words - 8 bytes */
2711  hNDoubleWords = (uint16_t)(hNBytes >> BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_TWO);
2712  /* Num of bytes less than 4 bytes */
2713  cNRemainderBytes = (uint8_t)(hNBytes & BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_THREE);
2714 
2715  /* Read 8 bytes at a time and perform CRC calculation */
2716  for (hIndex = BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_ZERO; hIndex < hNDoubleWords; hIndex++)
2717  {
2718  /*
2719  * Read 64 bit data from MB in little-endian mode
2720  * - the first byte of the message is in LSB
2721  */
2722  lDData_temp = BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_REG_READ32(wMbDataBaseAdd);
2723  lDData = (uint64_t)lDData_temp;
2724  wMbDataBaseAdd += (uint32_t)BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_FOUR;
2725 
2726  /*
2727  * Divide the message by the polynomial, a byte at a time.
2728  */
2729  for (cByte = BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_ZERO;
2730  cByte < BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_FOUR; cByte++)
2731  {
2732  /* Reminder upper byte xor with incoming data before dividing
2733  * with polynomial */
2734  cData = (uint8_t)((uint64_t)lDData & (uint64_t)0x000000FF) ^ \
2735  (uint8_t)(hRemainder >> (BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_EIGHT));
2736  /*
2737  * Perform poly divide on incoming data - the result from the
2738  * LUT, xor upper byte of result with lower byte of previous
2739  * reminder - this is to xor previous reminder
2740  * lower byte with next incoming data
2741  */
2742  hRemainder = hCrc16Table[cData] ^
2743  ((uint16_t)(hRemainder << BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_EIGHT));
2744  /* Get next byte in LSB - that is the next byte of message */
2745  lDData = lDData >> BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_EIGHT;
2746  }
2747  }
2748 
2749  /*
2750  * Read each bytes one at a time and perform CRC calculation if number
2751  * of bytes less than 4 bytes
2752  */
2753  for (hIndex = BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_ZERO;
2754  hIndex < cNRemainderBytes; hIndex++)
2755  {
2756  /* Read 1 byte data from MB */
2757  cData = BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_REG_READ8(wMbDataBaseAdd);
2758  wMbDataBaseAdd += (uint32_t)BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_ONE;
2759 
2760  /*
2761  * Divide the message by the polynomial, a byte at a time.
2762  */
2763 
2764  /* Reminder upper byte xor with incoming data before
2765  * dividing with polynomial */
2766  cData = cData ^ (uint8_t)(hRemainder >> BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_EIGHT);
2767  /*
2768  * Perform poly divide on incoming data - the result from the LUT,
2769  * xor upper byte of result with lower byte of previous reminder -
2770  * this is to xor previous reminder lower byte with next incoming
2771  * data
2772  */
2773  hRemainder = hCrc16Table[cData] ^
2774  ((uint16_t)(hRemainder << BSPDRV_AR12XX_CRC_M_EIGHT));
2775  }
2776 
2777  /*
2778  * The final remainder is the CRC.
2779  */
2780  if (outCrc != NULL)
2781  {
2782  *((uint16_t*)outCrc) = hRemainder;
2783  }
2784  }
2785  return retVal;
2786 }
2787 
2788 /*
2789  * END OF mmwl_port_ethernet.c FILE
2790  */
